Room.Name: The Shrine of Truth and Fairness
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the Paladin's Shrine of Truth and Fairness.
Room.LongDescription: The path of the Paladin is a noble and honorable one. Truth and fairness are the words the Paladin lives by. In order to advance yourself to the rank of Protector, you must first show your worthiness by defeating an equally equiped Paladin of the rank you aspire to be. Gallant Warriors should enter the green door to be promoted to Protector. Protector Warriors should enter the red door to be promoted to Protector, Second Class. Finally, Protector, Second Class Paladins should enter the white door to be promoted to the level of Protector, First Class. Good luck, mighty warriors. Advanced levels should find the Holy Order of the Red Rose on the east side of town.
